publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1134 Colin Fox: Remembering Mick McGahey-That the Parliament congratulates Midlothian Trades Union Council for organising a night to commemorate the life of Michael McGahey, the former leader of the National Union of Miners in Scotland; notes the success of last year's inaugural event; further notes that the 2004 event will take place in Loanhead Miners Welfare Society and Social Club on Saturday 1 May 2004, and wishes Michael McGahey's family, friends and comrades a successful night.
S2M-1134 Remembering Mick McGahey (lodged on 31 March 2004) Christine Grahame*, Alex Neil*

S2M-1134 Colin Fox: Remembering Mick McGahey-That the Parliament congratulates Midlothian Trades Union Council for organising a night to commemorate the life of Michael McGahey, the former leader of the National Union of Miners in Scotland; notes the success of last year's inaugural event; further notes that the 2004 event will take place in Loanhead Miners Welfare Society and Social Club on Saturday 1 May 2004, and wishes Michael McGahey's family, friends and comrades a successful night. Supported by: Christine Grahame, Alex Neil
S2M-1134 Remembering Mick McGahey (lodged on 31 March 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1134 Remembering Mick McGahey (lodged on 31 March 2004) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1134 Remembering Mick McGahey (lodged on 31 March 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1134 Remembering Mick McGahey (lodged on 31 March 2004) Elaine Smith*
